overview: Elvis Presley had a select group of friends he entrusted with his life.Through never seen before interviews, this documentary will explore Elvis’ life through the eyes of The Memphis Mafia, from the highs…To the lows. In his short lifetime Elvis became an icon that will never die.
tagline: Elvis Presley had a select group of friends he entrusted with his life.Through never seen before interviews, this documentary will explore Elvis’ life through the eyes of The Memphis Mafia, from the highs…To the lows.
title: Elvis & The Memphis Mafia
